dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Locked and loaded. Bullet type... Atelier Logic High Velocity Pulverisation Round. Right, then. Ready to fire.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Is it... morning outside? I 'spose there's still plenty of time left for the event to start. Haah... ow, my back.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามกลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Already preparin' for dinner at lunchtime? Looks like somethin' big's about to go down for sure. I've got to make sure my bullets are all in fine condition...

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: I'll take the shot when their leader starts the sermon before the worshippers following the dinner. It only takes one bullet.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg:
Didn't think it'd be this easy to slip by 'em. Must say, I don't quite get what it is with shoving a gear in your noggin' that leaves 'em slobberin' over your words...
Anyway, this'll be easier than I'd expected. Thought a capture mission would be more difficult.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: There ain't that many Workshops out there buildin' guns... and there ain't that many Fixer Officers usin' guns... Well, I suppose that's why we don't have any trouble picking up these contracts.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
I don't like what the Church of Gear does. Of course I don't. But... that's that, and a contract's a contract. No point in gettin' too invested about it, it'll just end up messin' up my aim.
Can't get a proper return on the investment if I don't make each shot count, given how expensive they are.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: Oh bloody hell— I missed! But I had a good shot, straight for the noggin... The hell's goin' on with that 'leader'?!

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
Blimey, we've really got to wrap this up soon... This gun ain't built to last! If the battle gets any longer, it might overheat until the barrel bursts!
Oi, got any bright ideas?

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: .... Unh, I must've taken a short kip. ...Tsk. Still waiting for 'em to get started, eh?

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Oh bugger, they saw us! Fall back! I'll return fire...!

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Uh, how many bullets should I bring for this contract?

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Let's try to make each bullet count. One shot, one kill.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: ... Don't try to chat me up when I'm holding my breath, yeah?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Opening fire!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Nice, it's been a breeze so far...!

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Ngh, dammit...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Clean shot to the head. Bullseye.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: You're shittin' me... I'm not finished yet...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg:
Right, all chuffed now?
The hell's up with askin' a sniper to do shite like this...?

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Like I said, I'm just some bloke who shoots guns, yeah? Why'd anyone...

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: 'Nother one down... Hope that did the job. I better not have spent too many bullets on this.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Hah, thought you could stop us with that little firepower? C'mon, let's loot the weapons those sods left behind.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: I should've taken a more careful shot... Or maybe I picked the wrong ammunition...? Hah, whatever... What matters is that I wasn't good enough.
